name: EverydayEasyChinese
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Learn and practice building phrases and sentences with a new Chinese word everyday. Teacher Lin from Everyday Easy Chinese will guide you through these new words!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
